Frequency once per minute

Trigger You critically succeed with an unarmed Strike against an opponent.

Your powerful attack causes damage that reverberates through your opponent's body, shaking muscle from bone. The creature takes @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage with a basic @Check[fortitude|against:class] save against your class DC. If it critically fails, it immediately dies as your blow tears apart its body internally.
